issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: UDF
components.description: This includes the UDFs and UDAFs

fields.description:
1. create function with invalid hdfs path, /udf/udf-test.jar does not exists
{quote}
create function my_lower as 'com.tang.UDFLower' using jar 'hdfs:///udf/udf-test.jar';
{quote}

Failed with following exception:

fields.summary: Create function failed but function in show function list

comments.body: [~navis] Could you take a look please, since you are the original author of this code.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12814010/HIVE-14113.1.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to no test(s) being added or modified.

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to 4 failed/errored test(s), 10258 tests executed
*Failed tests:*
{noformat}
TestMiniTezCliDriver-vectorization_13.q-tez_bmj_schema_evolution.q-schema_evol_text_nonvec_mapwork_part_all_primitive.q-and-12-more - did not produce a TEST-*.xml file
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestMiniLlapCliDriver.testCliDriver_vector_complex_all
org.apache.hadoop.hive.cli.TestMiniLlapCliDriver.testCliDriver_vector_complex_join
org.apache.hive.minikdc.TestJdbcNonKrbSASLWithMiniKdc.org.apache.hive.minikdc.TestJdbcNonKrbSASLWithMiniKdc
{noformat}
